topic.title: Number Of Pressure Ulcers Observation - conformance rules

lines.i: This clinical statement enumerates the number of pressure ulcers observed in a particular stage.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:14707, CONF:14708 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.76"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14705)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14706)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:14709)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:14767)/@code="2264892003" number of pressure ulcers (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:14768)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:14714)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT (CONF:14771)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] author (CONF:14717)
Contains exactly one [1..1] CDA Author

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:14718)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:14719)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:14720)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14721)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14722)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:14725), where the @code SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Pressure Ulcer Stage 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.35 DYNAMIC
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14705)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14706)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:14709)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:14767)/@code="2264892003" number of pressure ulcers (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:14768)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:14714)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT (CONF:14771)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] author (CONF:14717)
Contains exactly one [1..1] CDA Author

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:14718)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:14719)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:14720)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14721)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14722)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:14725), where the @code SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Pressure Ulcer Stage 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.35 DYNAMIC

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd" classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.76"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1124639507"/> <code code="2264892003" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT" displayName="number of pressure ulcers"/> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="INT" value="1"/> <author/> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ"> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <code code="2002818742"/> <value xsi:type="CD" code="458277302"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation>
